nodes.text: In the year 6 ABY a Conference on Popular Entertainment was held on the planet Obroa-skai. The Academician of Popular Studies Thunys Albegron spoke at the conference concerning the Holodrama True Tales of the Ancient Republic, in particular Episode XXIV: Death on the Rim, which aired in 114 BBY and starred the fictional Sector Ranger Novan Nune as the protagonist. Albegron looked at how the episode was based on a series of real events concerning the Hutt-backed assault on the planet Parcovey Minor and the Belasco Free Volunteers' journey to the planet Affavan shortly afterwards.

The conference was first mentioned in the 2014 fifth entry in the Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut series of posts by Jason Fry on the StarWars.com blog. The article featured content cut from The Essential Guide to Warfare a book released in 2012 by Fry.
